claim: Abomination also has accelerated healing, intelligence, super breath, and animation.
extra_info: Abomination refers to superhero_name = 'Abomination'; superpower refers to power_name;

claim: November Speaker, October Speaker, and September Speaker each had a parking cost below the overall average for parking.
extra_info: name of events refers to event_name; less than average parking cost refers to cost < DIVIDE(SUM(cost), COUNT(event_id)) where category = 'Parking'

claim: Among Codebase Community users who wrote comments scoring between 5 to 10, roughly one in five are paid, professional moderators employed by the platform.
extra_info: percentage = DIVIDE(COUNT(UserId where UpVotes = 0 and Score BETWEEN 5 and 10))*100, (COUNT(UserId where Score BETWEEN 5 and 10));

claim: Rounded to two decimals, the percent faster for Paul di Resta in raceId 853 versus raceId 854 (using race 853 as the baseline) is 32.50%.
extra_info: Paul di Resta refers to the full name of the driver; Full name of the driver refers to drivers.forename ='Paul' and drivers.surname = 'di Resta'; race number refers to raceId; percentage = DIVIDE(SUBTRACT(fastestLapSpeed(raceId = 853), (fastestLapSpeed (raceId = 854)) * 100 , (fastestLapSpeed(raceId = 853))

claim: The Singapore Grand Prix debuted on the Formula 1 calendar in 2008.
extra_info: the first race refers to race happened in min(year);

claim: In his debut race at the Australian Grand Prix, Lewis Hamilton scored 6 points.
extra_info: first race refers to min(Year); Lewis Hamiltonrefers to the full name of the driver; Full name of the driver refers to drivers.forename and drivers.surname;

claim: If the SAT excellence threshold were set to 1400 instead of 1500, none of the schools with phone numbers (714) 220-3055, (562) 229-7745, or (408) 366-7700 would remain in the top three by excellence rate.
extra_info: Excellence rate = NumGE1500 / NumTstTakr

claim: If tournament rules for the duel format fixed X at 2 for all spells, Entreat the Angels would not appear in the top ten cards by highest mana cost.
extra_info: duels refer to format = 'duel'; the highest uncoverted mana cost refers to MAX(manaCost)

claim: User ID 919 does not lead the platform in profile views; spacedman holds the top spot.
extra_info: users have the highest number of views refer to DisplayName where MAX(Views);

claim: Exactly three cards that are available in paper have a positive starting maximum hand size.
extra_info: available in paper refers to availability like '%paper%'; have a positive starting maximum hand size refers to hand = '3'

claim: Patient 4413615 is the earliest recorded case with abnormal anti-SSA in the dataset.
extra_info: first patient refers to ID with MIN(`First Date`); abnormal anti-SSA refers to SSA NOT IN('negative', '0');

claim: Grandstand noise levels surpassed 110 decibels as Lewis Hamilton crossed the timing line on the lap in which he set the fastest lap in a Formula 1 race.
extra_info: fastest lap refers to MIN(time)

claim: Among California K-12 schools ranked by enrollment, the 11th-highest-enrollment school's eligible free rate is 0.2905894519131334 (about 29.06%).
extra_info: K-12 refers to students in grades 1 through 12; Eligible free rate for K-12 = `Free Meal Count (K-12)` / `Enrollment (K-12)`
